name.description: The name displayed for this video.

description.description: A short description of the video.

duration.description: The duration of the video in seconds.

url.description: A URL from which this video may be streamed.

date.description: The date this video was published. Preferred format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

isFeatured.description: Featured videos may receive special UI treatment or be sorted to the top of the video list.
